reqs:
******* IF course is FULL please contact School of Nursing Student Support Office (student.services@nursing.ubc.ca) *******
Theoretical Foundations of Nursing Practice - This course provides students with the opportunity to explore the evolution of nursing knowledge and the processes of theoretical and analytical reasoning as they apply to nursing. In the context of the course students will apply critical thinking to the understanding and resolution of nursing problems.
Waitlist Section for NURS 511-001
